ClassDef.Name: Camera

Properties.Name: Mode
Properties.Description: Determines or returns the camera's current mode.

Properties.Name: FOV
Properties.Description: Determines or returns the camera's field of view.

Properties.Name: ClipThroughWalls
Properties.Description: Determines whether or not the camera should clip through walls.

Properties.Name: MinDistance
Properties.Description: The camera's minimum distance from the player in Follow mode.

Properties.Name: MaxDistance
Properties.Description: Determines camera's maximum distance from the player in Follow mode.

Properties.Name: Distance
Properties.Description: Determines the distance between the camera and the player when the camera is in Follow mode.

Properties.Name: ScrollSensitivity
Properties.Description: Determines the scroll move speed of the camera.

Properties.Name: Orthographic
Properties.Description: Determines whether or not the camera should render in orthographic (2D) mode or not (3D).

Properties.Name: FollowLerp
Properties.Description: Determines whether or not to use lerping in Follow mode.

Properties.Name: LerpSpeed
Properties.Description: Determines the lerp speed of the camera when lerping is enabled.

Properties.Name: OrthographicSize
Properties.Description: Determines the half-size of the camera when in orthographic mode.

Properties.Name: PositionOffset
Properties.Description: Determines the camera's offset from its position.

Properties.Name: RotationOffset
Properties.Description: Determines the camera's offset from its rotation.

Properties.Name: IsFirstPerson
Properties.Description: Returns whether or not the camera is in first person.

Properties.Name: CanLock
Properties.Description: Determine if camera can be ctrl locked.

Properties.Name: SensitivityMultiplier
Properties.Description: Multipler for camera sensitivity

Properties.Name: Sensitivity
Properties.Description: Current sensitivity of the camera

Properties.Name: HorizontalSpeed
Properties.Description: Determines the horizontal movement speed of the camera in Follow mode.

Properties.Name: VerticalSpeed
Properties.Description: Determines the vertical move speed of the camera.

Properties.Name: ScrollLerpSpeed
Properties.Description: Determines the lerp amount when scrolling

Properties.Name: CtrlLocked
Properties.Description: Determine if camera is in Ctrl lock mode

Properties.Name: AlwaysLocked
Properties.Description: Determine if camera should always be in locked mode

Properties.Name: Target
Properties.Description: The target of Follow mode

Methods.Name: ViewportPointToRay
Methods.Description: Cast a ray from the camera at the specified ViewportPoint (Vector3 with components with values in range of 0 - 1 describing how far a point is to to right and to the top of the screen) into the game world

Methods.Name: ScreenPointToRay
Methods.Description: Cast a ray from the camera at screen point into the game world

Methods.Name: ViewportToScreenPoint
Methods.Description: Transforms `pos` from viewport space into screen space.

Methods.Name: ViewportToWorldPoint
Methods.Description: Transforms `pos` from viewport space into world space.

Methods.Name: WorldToViewportPoint
Methods.Description: Transforms `pos` from world space into viewport space.

Methods.Name: WorldToScreenPoint
Methods.Description: Transforms `pos` from world space into screen space.

Methods.Name: ScreenToViewportPoint
Methods.Description: Transforms `pos` from screen space into viewport space.

Methods.Name: ScreenToWorldPoint
Methods.Description: Transforms `pos` from screen space into world space.

Events.Name: FirstPersonEntered
Events.Description: Fires when camera has entered first person

Events.Name: FirstPersonExited
Events.Description: Fires when camera has exited first person

ClassDef.Description: Camera is a class that represents the local player's camera.
